text.div:
Australian Medication

https://healthterminologies.gov.au/fhir/ValueSet/australian-medication-1

The Australian Medication value set includes all Australian Medicines Terminology (AMT) product concepts that may be used for the identification of a medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good. This is suitable for the recording of a product which may be ordered for, administered to, or used by an individual.
